PlanDetails:Enjoy 100GB 4G data and Unlimited 5G data in Kuala Lumpur|Cyberjaya & Putrajaya|Unlimited calls to ALL networks|Unlimited SMS to YES networks|Pay-as-you-use SMS to other networks|24 months contract;description1:Enjoy 100GB 4G data and Unlimited 5G data in Kuala Lumpur, Cyberjaya & Putrajaya;description2:Enjoy 24 month installment on your new smart phone.
